snippet.title: Ryan Marks Revenge Mission - Story Trailer | PSVR Japan [ライアン・マークス　リベンジミッション]
snippet.description:
A man stood up to save the family who had been taken away by the imminent criminal organization. Elite Special Forces member Ryan Marks will squeeze outsiders of blood and cover London with smoke. Guns and gunpowder are the only keys needed to drive on this road!
In the Ryan Marks Revenge Mission, you will dive into a dangerous, back-to-back battle. Bullet-blowing action, breathless thrilling pursuits, and dramatic stories. These are combined with the realism unique to VR, and the ultimate "action hero movie experience" is born.

#ryanmarksrevengemission


Our homepage (Estonian): http://videogamers.eu/
